Sentencas: Several cathodes working in hydrocarbons diluted atmospheres have been proposed for single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) fabrication.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: But, few cathodes work well in propane.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: In this work, we propose a new stable cathode of La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 (LSCO) for the single-chamber SOFCs, which works well in diluted propane atmospheres.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: For this purpose, powders of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 (CGO) for electrolytes and powders of (LSCO) for cathodes were prepared by sol-gel related techniques as pentadionate methods.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: These methods consist of preparing a solution from the acetates or pentadionates followed by a jellification.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Then, the decomposition of the organic molecules is initiated, obtaining nanometric powders of the abovementioned compounds.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: In this way, we have obtained high purity powders of CGO and LSCO as confirmed by x-ray diffraction powder analysis.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Microstructure was analyzed by SEM and TEM microscopy, the analysis of the powders obtained by sol-gel techniques shows a nanometric size grain (similar to 30 nm) and reactivity for sintering was studied in detail.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Very high-density electrolytes (similar to 95-99% of theoretical density) were obtained with better power density currents than in samples prepared by solid-state reaction samples.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Uniaxial pressing ceria based electrolytes were prepared from these powders and characterized in one chamber reactor using propane as fuel and LSCO + CGO as cathode.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Anodes were prepared from Ni + CGO mixtures.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Different gas mixtures of propane and air were prepared and tested at different flow rates in order to optimize electrical properties.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode

Sentencas: Stable single-chamber fuel cells working in diluted propane atmospheres could be prepared with these materials.
Titulo: Stable single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells based on doped ceria electrolytes and La0.5Sr0.5CoO3 as a new cathode
